column1: Smoque BBQ////I had the 1/2 and 1/2 sandwich with chopped brisket and pulled pork.  I admit
column2: the brisket was a little dry
column3: but their BBQ sauce is outstanding and I doused my sandwich in it.  The sandwich was huge
column4: half of it would have been filling enough with all the sides.  Sandwiches come with coleslaw and the choice of one another side.  I ordered the macaroni & cheese
column5: which is the best macaroni & cheese I have had at any BBQ joint.  It was creamy and had a crunchy topping.  I usually don't like coleslaw
column6: but it looked pretty good and I ate a few bites.  It's fresh
column7: not that slimy stuff you see everywhere else.
